verbs.description: [ARG1: south carolina senator] [V: honored] [ARGM-TMP: 150 years after his assassination on october 16 1868] senator benjamin randolph was assassinated while he was on a campaign trail hated for his civil rights activism then now more than a century later he continues to be honored in the cemetery that bears his name 150 years supreme page randolph cemetery beautification of randolph cemetery south carolina senator south carolinas senator benjamin randolph
